Commands.Dark Attack: Ranged BRV attack  Target: 1 turn Blind
Commands.Great Daring: Increases BRV based on ATK, then BRV × 1.2  Self: Low chance 4 turns ATK Up II, DEF Up II, SPD Up II

Passives.Dark Attack Up: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Dark Attack.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Great Daring Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Great Daring.
Passives.Dark Attack Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using Dark Attack.
Passives.Great Daring Attack Up: Slightly raises Attack for 1 turn after using Great Daring.
Passives.Great Daring Charge: Increases the max uses of Great Daring by 1.
Passives.Aurochs Spirit: Counters avoided enemy attacks with a BRV attack.
Passives.Buffed Attack: Slightly raises ATK with active buffs
Passives.Dark Attack Extension: When using Dark Attack:   Blind duration +1After using Dark Attack:   Triggers additional HP attack   BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (damage boost) for 6 turns
Passives.Player-Coach: Slightly raises party's INT BRV, MAX BRV, ATK, DEF, SPD with active buffs
Passives.Great Daring Extension: Great Daring use +1When using Great Daring:   Slightly increased BRV gain based on ATK, extended to partyAfter using Great Daring:   Triggers additional HP attack

Weapons.Double Penalty CP: 35: Increases Great Daring's max uses by 1.Increases its BRV Gain and lowers its Action Delay.Raises the success rate of ATK Up, DEF Up and SPD Up, increases their potency and extends their duration.Grants Great Max BRV Up for 6 turns.
Weapons.All-Rounder CP: 15: Increases the potency of Dark Attack and lowers its Action Delay.
